Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Expands the amount of information available about registered sex offenders on the division of criminal justice services website
Summary: Expands the amount of information available to police and the public, by means of the internet, on registered sex offenders.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the registration of sex offenders
